feed.title: 黑客新闻摘要; ;https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml; ;2023-07-22T05:58:11.335015Z; ; ; ; ;polyrabbit; ;https://github.com/polyrabbit/; ; ;Werkzeug; ; ;Llama：添加基于语法的采样</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/ggerganov/llama.cpp/pull/1773</id>; <更新>;2023-07-21T21 ：58：02.245549Z </更新>; <link href =“https://github.com/ggerganov/llama.cpp/pull/1773”/>; <作者>; <name>;davepeck</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=davepeck</uri>; </author>; <content type =“html”>; <img src =“https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/242054” 3/250365685-5bd15da2-78c1-4625-be90-1e938e6823f1.gif"样式="宽度：220像素；高度：110像素；" />;<br />;本文介绍了一个 API，它采用序列化的上下文无关语法来指导和约束采样。它还提供了一个类似 Backus-Naur 形式 (BNF) 的语法示例，用于指定生成的语法。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#llama-add-grammar-based-sampling" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36819906" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;员工对 Anchor Brewery 出价</stitle>; <id>;https://vinepair.com/booze-news/anchor-employees-brewery-takeover-bid/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-22T00:58:02.361248Z</updated>; <link href="https://vinepair.com/booze-news/anchor-employees-brew ery-takeover-bid/"/>; <author>; <name>;selimthegrim</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=selimthegrim</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://vinepair.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/07/anchor-bottle-card-375x450.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 264 像素；” />;<br />;在高管宣布这家历史悠久的旧金山公司将被关闭后，Anchor Brewing Co. 的员工表达了购买该啤酒厂并将其作为工人合作社经营的愿望。员工们要求有公平的机会继续工作并保持啤酒厂的运营。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#employees-bid-on-anchor-brewery" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36821861" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed .xml">; <title type="text">;互联网搜索提示</stitle>; <id>;https://gwern.net/search</id>; <updated>;2023-07-22T03:58:02.362933Z</updated>; <link href="https://gwern.net/search"/>; <author>; <name>;herbertl</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=herbertl</uri>; </author>; <内容类型 =“html”>;<img src =“https://gwern.net/doc/technology/google/gwern-googlesearch-tools-daterange.png”样式 =“宽度：220 像素；高度：145 像素；” />;<br />;随着时间的推移，我在网上查找参考文献、论文和书籍方面积累了一定的谷歌能力和专业知识。其中一些技巧并不为人所知，例如在互联网档案馆 (IA) 中查找书籍。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#internet-search-tips" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36822880" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;为什么压力和真空腌制不起作用（2016）</stitle>; <id>;https://genuineideas.com/ArticlesIndex/Pressuremarinade.html</id>; <updated>;2023-07-22T01:58:02.363680Z</updated>; <link href="https://genuineideas.com/ArticlesIndex/Pressuremarinade.html"/>; <author>; <name>;OJFord</name>; <uri >;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=OJFord</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://genuineideas.com/Assets/imageassets/incompressible_matrix.gif" style="width: 220px; height: 121px;" />;<br />;压力和真空腌制对肉类不起作用。肉几乎是不可压缩的，并且没有空的气孔，因此不可能将腌料拉入内部。真空腌泡特别无效，因为当肉基质收缩时，在真空步骤中吸入的任何腌泡汁都会被排出。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#why-Pressure-and-vacuum-marination-does-not-work-2016" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36783937" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hacker news.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;在 Windows NT 网络配置中使用 Prolog (1996)</stitle>; <id>;https://web.archive.org/web/20030218034509/http://www.research.microsoft.com/research/dtg/davidhov/pap.htm</id>; <更新>;2023-07-22T00:58:02。 364362Z</updated>; <link href="https://web.archive.org/web/20030218034509/http://www.research.microsoft.com/research/dtg/davidhov/pap.htm"/>; <author>; <name>;zdw</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=zdw</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;微软的Windows NT操作系统使用嵌入式Prolog解释器来配置其局域网和广域网系统。描述了解决管道问题的算法，包括其正向和负向约束、Prolog 数据库和效率考虑。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#using-prolog-in-windows-nt-network-configuration-1996" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36821871" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews. betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;受损的 Microsoft 密钥：比我们想象的影响更大</stitle>; <id>;https://www.wiz.io/blog/storm-0558-compromished-microsoft-key-enables-authentication-of-countless-micr</id>; <updated>;2023-07-22T03:58:02.365066Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.betacat.io/feed.xml">; wiz.io/blog/storm-0558-compromished-microsoft-key-enables-authentication-of-countless-micr"/>; <author>; <name>;882542F3884314B</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=882542F3884314B</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.d atocms-assets.com/75231/1689885318-research_blog_post_cover.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：124px；" />;<br />;Microsoft 和 CISA 披露了一起安全事件，威胁行为者获取了私有加密密钥，并用它来伪造 Outlook Web Access 和 Outlook.com 的访问令牌。泄露的密钥比最初想象的更强大，允许威胁参与者伪造多种类型的 Azure Active Directory 应用程序的访问令牌。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#compromished-microsoft-key-more-impactful-than-we-thought" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36823007" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat .io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;MiniZinc</stitle>; <id>;https://www.minizinc.org/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-21T18:58:02.365734Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.minizinc.org/"/>; <author>; <name>;gavi</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=gavi</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.minizinc.org/MiniZn_logo.png" style="width: 220px; height: 220px;" />;<br />;MiniZinc 是一种高级建模语言，可让您对约束满足和优化问题进行建模。它提供了一个大型的预定义约束库，可以编译成 FlatZinc，这是一种许多解算器都能理解的解算器输入语言。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#minizinc" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36817628" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Web 环境界面grity API提案</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/RupertBenWiser/Web-Environment-Integrity</id>; <updated>;2023-07-21T18:58:02.366390Z</updated>; <link href="https://github.com/RupertBenWiser/Web-Environment-Integrity"/>; <author>; <name>;reactormonk</name>; <uri>; https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=reactormonk</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://opengraph.githubassets.com/3e5746f7427e9d6ea003ffda42275633b139b5a896d712bbc80935e54957816b/RupertBenWiser/Web-En vironment-Integrity" style="宽度：220px；高度：110px；" />;<br />;此存储库详细介绍了添加新 API 以确定 Web 环境完整性的提案：<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#web-environment-integrity-api-proposal" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36817305" target="_blank">;[comments]</a>;</content>; </entry >; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;FBI 对美国参议员不当使用 702 监视权力</stitle>; <id>;https://thehill.com/homenews/administration/4110850-fbi-improperly-used-702-surveillance-powers-on-us-senator/</id>; <更新>;2023-07-2 2T02:58:02.367046Z</更新>; <link href="https://thehill.com/homenews/administration/4110850-fbi-improperly-used-702-surveillance-powers-on-us-senator/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;ramblenode </名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=ramblenode</uri>; </作者>; <内容type="html">;<img src="https://i0.wp.com/thehill.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/2023/07/AP910776172115-e1689375358323.jpg?w=2000&ssl=1" style="width: 220px; height: 124px;" />;<br />;根据法庭记录，FBI 不当使用监视权力来搜索有关美国参议员、州议员和州法官的信息。外国情报监视法院 (FISC) 的意见中记录了 FBI 对《外国情报监视法》第 702 条的使用，这肯定会给情报界带来挑战。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#fbi-im正确使用-702-surveillance-powers-on-us-senator" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36822654" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Con将失败作为核心生活技能</stitle>; <id>;https://buildinghealthier.substack.com/p/confronting-failure-as-a-core-life</id>; <updated>;2023-07-22T00:58:02.367714Z</updated>; <link href="https://buildinghealthier.substack.com/p/confronting-failure-as-a-core-life"/>; <author>; <name>;blh 75</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=blh75</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://substackcdn.com/image/fetch/w_120,c_limit,f_auto,q_auto:good,fl_progressive:steep/https%3A%2F%2Fsubstack-post-media.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fpublic%2F图片%2F627efde7-8e44-414c-9cf3-32ba9d1649c4_3223x4000.jpeg" style="宽度：220px; height: 274px;" />;<br />;一年前，作者在旧金山工作，但现在他们在越南反思他们失败的数字健康公司。他们过去常常针对有关失败的问题制定类似营销活动的回应，但现在他们抓住机会就失败进行真诚的对话。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#confronting-failure-as-a-core-life-skill" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; < a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36784114" target="_blank">;[comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;发现：金属可以自我修复</stitle>; <id>;https://newsreleases.sandia.gov/healing_metals/</id>; <更新>; 2023-07-22T02：58：02.368373Z </更新>; <link href =“https://newsreleases.sandia.gov/healing_metals/”/>; <作者>; <name>;bobvanluijt </name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=bobvanluijt </uri>; </author>; <content type =“html”>; <img src =“https://newsreleases。 sandia.gov/wp-content/uploads/2023/07/CFB1795-scaled.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 147px;" />;<br />;科学家观察到金属碎片在没有人为干预的情况下会破裂并重新融合在一起，这对科学理论提出了挑战。如果可以利用这种现象，它可能会导致发动机、桥梁和飞机的自我修复，从而使它们更安全、更持久。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#discovery-metals-can-heal-themselves" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36822530" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;用恐怖小店管理厨房果蝇</stitle>; <id>;https://blog.zaccohn.com/Fruitflies-and-the-Little -Shop-of-Horrors/</id>; <更新>;2023-07-21T22:58:02.369032Z</更新>; <link href="https://blog.zaccohn.com/Fruitflies-and-the-Little-Shop-of-Horrors/"/>; <作者>; <name>;zacharycohn</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=zacharyco hn</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://blog.zaccohn.com/images/blog_pitcherplants.jpeg" style="width: 220px; height: 124px;" />;<br />;每年夏天，作者的厨房尽管定期清洁，但还是被果蝇侵扰。他们尝试使用陷阱，但发现它们难看。然后他们发现了肉食性猪笼草，特别是紫猪笼草，它有效地控制了果蝇的数量。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#managing-kitchen-fruit-flies-with-a-little-shop-of-horrors" target="_blan k">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36820469" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;记者应对包括科学家在内的所有来源持怀疑态度</stitle>; <id>;https://natesilver.substack。 com/p/journalists-should-be-skeptical-of</id>; <更新>;2023-07-21T20:58:02.369698Z</更新>; <link href="https://natesilver.substack.com/p/journalists-should-be-skeptical-of"/>; <作者>; <name>;amadeuspagel</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id =amadeuspagel</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://substackcdn.com/image/fetch/w_1456,c_limit,f_auto,q_auto:good,fl_progressive:steep/https%3A%2F%2Fsubstack-post-media.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fpublic%2Fimages%2F2e937c74-f2b6-47 8a-aa5d-c485635efa71_820x385.webp"样式="宽度：220px； height: 104px;" />;<br />;一组科学家在《自然医学》上发表了一篇关于 COVID-19 起源的论文，该论文与他们的真实信仰相矛盾并误导了公众。作者操纵媒体叙述，并受到职业影响和政治强烈反对的动机。记者应该对包括科学家在内的所有消息来源持怀疑态度。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#journalists-should-be-skeptical-of-all-sources-include-scient ists" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36818896" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Bfs 3.0：最快的查找</stitle>; <id>;https://tavian ator.com/2023/bfs_3.0.html</id>; <更新>;2023-07-22T00:58:02.372090Z</更新>; <link href="https://tavianator.com/2023/bfs_3.0.html"/>; <作者>; <name>;rurban</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=rurban</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;Bfs 3.0 是一个通过文件系统进行广度优先搜索的工具。新版本包括异步、并行目录遍历，使其比以前的版本和 GNU find 更高效、更快。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#bfs-3-0-the-fastest-find-yet" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36783449" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io /feed.xml">; <title type="text">;对于 BSD Unix，这是 Sayonara (1992)</stitle>; <id>;https://www.tech-insider.org/unix/research/1992/0622.html</id>; <updated>;2023-07-21T18:58:02.372816Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.tech-insider.org/unix/research/ 1992/0622.html"/>; <author>; <name>;operator-name</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=operator-name</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;BSD Unix 的最终版本标志着加州大学伯克利分校参与操作系统业务的结束。 BSD Unix 自 1988 年以来因其无需许可费和尖端技术而在学术界广受欢迎。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#for-bsd-unix-it-s-sayon​​ara-1992" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36817482" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.beta cat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;“最好的蓝莓”：一种微小的北美水果如何占领澳大利亚（2022）</stitle>; <id>;https://www.theguardian.com/food/2022/oct/29/the-best-blueberry-how-a-tiny-north-american-fruit-took-over-australia</id>; <updated>;2023-07-21T23:58:02 .373700Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.theguardian.com/food/2022/oct/29/the-best-blueberry-how-a-tiny-north-american-fruit-took-over-australia"/>; <作者>; <name>;小牛</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=calf</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src ="https://i.guim.co.uk/img/media/b26d00b62f1ebbeb299aaa2647c209a93f708c0c/0_203_6016_3610/master/6016.jpg?width=445&dpr=1&s=none" style="宽度：220px；高度：132px；" />;<br />;澳大利亚培育的蓝莓品种尤里卡 (Eureka) 荣获三星级高级口味奖。过去五年，澳大利亚的蓝莓产量增加了两倍，而且几乎全年种植。蓝莓已成为一种需求量很大的流行超级食品。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-best-blueberry-how-a-tiny-north-american-fruit-took-over-australia-2022" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36797636" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <条目 xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;NativePHP：使用 PHP 构建桌面应用程序的框架</stitle>; <id>;https://nativephp.com/docs/1/getting-started/introduction</id>; <updated>;2023-07-21T22:58:02.374436Z</updated>; <link href="https://nativephp.com/docs/1/ getting-started/introduction"/>; <author>; <name>;brysonreece</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=brysonreece</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;NativePHP 是一个使用 PHP 快速构建丰富的本机桌面应用程序的新框架。它使 PHP 开发人员能够使用熟悉的工具和技术创建跨平台的本机应用程序。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#nativephp-a-framework-for-building-desktop-apps-using-php" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36820555" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews. betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;因销售全新加密挖矿显卡而被捕</stitle>; <id>;https://www.techspot.com/news/99488-chinese-group-arrested- sell-former-cryptomining-graphics-cards.html</id>; <updated>;2023-07-22T03:58:02.375142Z</updated>; <link href="https ://www.techspot.com/news/99488-chinese-group-arrested- sell-former-cryptomining-graphics-cards.html"/>; <author>; <name>;thunderbong</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=thunderbong</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.techspot.com/images2/news/bigimage/20 23/07/2023-07-21-image-3.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：115px；" />;<br />;中国的一个团伙因将旧加密货币挖矿显卡当作全新显卡出售而被捕。该组织会批量购买用过的 GPU，进行清理，然后重新包装以作为新型号出售。这些假卡的价值估计超过 200 万美元。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#group-arrested-for- sell-former-cryptomining-graphics-cards-as-brand-new" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;书评：交易法则</stitle>; <id>;https://astralcodexten。 substack.com/p/your-book-review-the-laws-of-trading</id>; <更新>;2023-07-21T21:58:02.375830Z</updated>; <link href="https://astralcodexten.substack.com/p/your-book-review-the-laws-of-trading"/>; <作者>; <name>;feross</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator。 com/user?id=feross</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://substackcdn.com/image/fetch/w_1456,c_limit,f_auto,q_auto:good,fl_progressive:steep/https%3A%2F%2Fsubstack-post-media.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fpublic%2Fimages%2F4c83fb0a-dce8- 47ca-9dd7-276236fa4a69_1200x742.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：137px；" />;<br />;奥古斯丁·勒布朗的《交易法则》是一本结合了交易、哲学和决策的独特书籍。勒布朗将金融市场视为一个竞争环境，参与者必须适应，否则就会死亡。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#book-review-the-laws-of-trading" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36820105" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml ">; <title type="text">;《魔兽世界》玩家欺骗 AI 抓取网站发布废话</stitle>; <id>;https://www.forbes.com/sites/paultassi/2023/07/21/world-of-warcraft-players-trick-ai-scraping-games-website-into-publishing-nonsense/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-21T16:58:02 .377811Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.forbes.com/sites/paultassi/2023/07/21/world-of-warcraft-players-trick-ai-scraping-games-website-into-publishing-nonsense/"/>; <作者>; <name>;mikhael</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=mikhael</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://specials-images.forbesimg.com/imageserve/60405e99c4959a8b4cd30b0e/400x0.jpg?cropX1=0&cropX2=1080&cropY1=0&cropY2=1080" style="宽度：220px；高度：221px；" />;<br />;Reddit 魔兽世界子版块发现一个网站正在抓取他们的帖子并使用人工智能来生成文章。作为回应，Reddit 用户创建了一个关于游戏中不存在的功能的假帖子，并且该网站发布了一篇基于该帖子的文章。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#world-of-warcraft-players-trick-ai-scraping-website-into-publishing-nonsense" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36815744" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml :base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;TH3P4G3 Thunderbolt eGPU Dock 评测 (2022)</stitle>; <id>;https://egpu.io/exp-gdc-th3p4g2-thunderbolt-gpu-dock-review/</id>; <更新>;2023-07-21T21:58:02.378493Z</更新>; <link href="https://egpu.io/exp-gdc-th3p4g2-thunderbolt-gpu-dock-review/"/>; <author>; <name>;mvolfik</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=mvolfik</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;TH3P4G2 是一款紧凑且功能齐全的 Thunderbolt eGPU 适配器，提供菊花链支持和现代 Thunderbol t 控制器。它是一体化 eGPU 扩展坞解决方案或定制 eGPU 外壳平台的绝佳选择。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#th3p4g3-thunderbolt-egpu-dock-review-2022" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36820205" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hacker news.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;RFC 9420 又名消息层安全</stitle>; <id>;https://blog.phnx.im/rfc-9420-mls/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-21T16:58:02.379142Z</updated>; <link href="https://blog.phnx.im/rfc-9420- mls/"/>; <author>; <name>;jakobdabo</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=jakobdabo</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://blog.phnx.im/content/images/size/w960/2023/07/Header-MLS-RFC.png" style="width: 220px; height: 134px;" />;<br />;消息层安全 (MLS) 协议以 RFC 9420 的形式发布，是第一个标准化且完全指定的端到端加密协议。它在可扩展性和效率方面对现有协议进行了改进。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#rfc-9420-aka-messaging-layer-security" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36815705" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io /feed.xml">; <title type="text">;FreeWilly 1 和 2，两个新的开放式法学硕士</stitle>; <id>;https://stability.ai/blog/freewilly-large-instruction-fine-tuned-models</id>; <updated>;2023-07-21T20:58:02.379783Z</updated>; <link href="https://stability.ai/blog/freewilly-large-instruction-fine -tuned-models"/>; <author>; <name>;anigbrowl</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=anigbrowl</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://images.squarespace-cdn.com/content/v1/6213c340453c3f502425776e/29202f99-d2d9-41 2f-8aeb-f2881514b920/Arcane_magic_with_an_orca_whale_swimming_in_the_galaxy_filled_with_vibrant_stars_steps-40_style-Pixel_Art_seed-0ts-1689963125_idx-0.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：221px；" />;<br />;Stability AI 及其 CarperAI 实验室发布了 FreeWilly1 和 FreeWilly2，这两个新的开放访问大型语言模型 (LLM) 展示了卓越的推理能力。这些模型是在非商业许可下发布的研究实验。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#freewilly-1-and-2-two-new-open-access-llms" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36818923" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat .io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;GNU PSPP</stitle>; <id>;https://www.gnu.org/software/pspp/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-22T03:58:02.380411Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.gnu.org/software/pspp/"/>; <author>; <name>;gjvc</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator。 com/user?id=gjvc</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.gnu.org/software/pspp/images/variable-sheet-thumb.png" style="width: 220px; height: 149px;" />;<br />;GNU PSPP 是一个对采样数据进行统计分析的程序。它是专有程序 SPSS 的免费替代品，没有时间限制或人为限制使用。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#gnu-pspp" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36822994" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;我有用 Rust 编写了一个 JVM</stitle>; <id>;https://andreabergia.com/blog/2023/07/i-have-writing-a-jvm-in-rust/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-21T08:58:02.381794Z</updated>; <link href="https://andreabergia.com/blog/2023/07/i-have-writing-a-jvm-in-rus t/"/>; <author>; <name>;lukastyrychtr</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=lukastyrychtr</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://andreabergia.com/images/2023/07/gc1.png" style="width: 220px; height: 103px;" />;<br />;我用 Rust 编写了一个 Java 虚拟机，称为 rjvm。它是一个出于学习目的而构建的玩具 JVM，而不是一个严肃的实现。它支持执行字节码指令、处理局部变量和堆栈元素以及调用方法。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#i-have-writing-a-jvm-in-rust" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36811554" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed. xml">; <title type="text">;不要取笑著名的丹·布朗 (2013)</stitle>; <id>;https://onehundredpages.wordpress.com/2013/06/12/dont-make-fun-of-renowned-dan-brown/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-21T19:58:02.382496Z</updated>; <link href="https://onehundredpage s.wordpress.com/2013/06/12/dont-make-fun-of-renowned-dan-brown/"/>; <author>; <name>;codetrotter</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=codetrotter</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;著名作家 Dan Brown 愤怒地醒来，因为他知道他的新书将受到评论家的攻击。尽管受到批评，他的经纪人还是让他放心，并意识到他数以百万计的粉丝和财富比少数批评者的意见更重要。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#dont-make-fun-of-renowned-dan-brown-2013" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36818501" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews. betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Slackware Linux 发行版已满 30 岁</stitle>; <id>;https://www.theregister.com/2023/07/20/slackware_turns_30/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-21T19:58:02.383239Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.theregister.com/2023/07 /20/slackware_turns_30/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;akoster</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=akoster</uri>; </作者>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://regmedia.co.uk/2023/07/19/slack-15-boot.png?x=648&y=360&infer_y=1" style="width: 220 像素；高度：123 像素；" />;<br />;Slackware Linux 项目正在庆祝其成立 30 周年。它是仍在积极维护和开发的最古老的 Linux 发行版。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#slackware-linux-distribution-turns-30-years-old" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36818233" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; </feed>;
